org.openimaj.video

Class AnimatedVideo<I extends Image<?,I>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.video.Video<I>
      • org.openimaj.video.AnimatedVideo<I>
  • Type Parameters:
    I -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Iterable<I>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    VideoVisualisation

    public abstract class AnimatedVideo<I extends Image<?,I>>
extends Video<I>
    A basic abstract implementation of a video that displays an image and provides double-buffering
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AnimatedVideo(I blankFrame)
      Default video constructor with a rate of 30 fps using the given image as a basis.
      AnimatedVideo(I blankFrame, double fps)
      Default video constructor with the given rate using the given image as a basis.

      • countFrames

        public long countFrames()
        Description copied from class: Video
        Return the number of frames in the whole video. If the video is a live stream, then this method should return -1.
